docs.lead_paragraph: Since the baby boomers discovered yoga, the arousal, sweating, heavy breathing and states of undress that characterize yoga classes have led to predictable results.

headline.seo: Yoga Fans Sexual Flames and, Predictably, Plenty of Scandal
headline.main: Yoga and Sex Scandals: No Surprise Here
headline.print_headline: Yoga and Sex Scandals: No Surprise Here

docs.abstract: Many followers of John Friend, founder of fast-growing Yoga technique Anusara, are discouraged after learning that he has been accused of sexual impropriety with a number of female students; Friend's fall from grace is emblematic of the sexually-charged nature of Yoga, which began as a Tantric practice, and has often been associated with sexual scandal; some researchers are beginning to understand the physiological underpinnings of how Yoga leads to arousal.
docs.snippet: Since the baby boomers discovered yoga, the arousal, sweating, heavy breathing and states of undress that characterize yoga classes have led to predictable results.

docs.lead_paragraph: Rick Santorum brought the hateful rhetoric of the culture war to one of America’s last strongholds of bipartisan cooperation: care for people with disabilities.
docs.snippet: Rick Santorum brought the hateful rhetoric of the culture war to one of America’s last strongholds of bipartisan cooperation: care for people with disabilities.

docs.lead_paragraph: Framing a pre-abortion ultrasound as empowering information, or as a violation of a woman’s dignity.

headline.seo: Ultrasound: A Pawn in the Abortion Wars
headline.main: Ultrasound: A Pawn in the Abortion Wars
headline.print_headline: Ultrasound: A Pawn in the Abortion Wars

docs.abstract: News analysis; debate over legislation in Virginia that would require a woman seeking an abortion to first have an ultrasound ended up revolving around the nature of the ultrasound, with anti-abortion forces trying to define it as something benign while their opponents successfully cast it in the most ominous terms; crucial to the fight is the belief among abortion opponents that viewing an ultrasound will help convince pregnant women not to undergo an abortion, which is unsupported by clinical studies.
docs.snippet: Framing a pre-abortion ultrasound as empowering information, or as a violation of a woman’s dignity.

docs.lead_paragraph: Selenium, a metal byproduct of mining that is known to be toxic to wildlife, is under review by federal agencies who are re-evaluating safe levels in creeks in southern Idaho.

headline.seo: Mutated Trout Raise New Concerns Over Selenium
headline.main: Mutated Trout Raise New Concerns Near Mine Sites
headline.print_headline: Mutated Trout Raise New Concerns Near Mine Sites

docs.abstract: Selenium, a metal byproduct of mining that is known to be toxic to wildlife, is under review by federal agencies that are re-evaluating safe levels in creeks in southern Idaho; study commissioned by J R Simplot, whose mining operations have polluted creeks there concluded that it would be safe to allow selenium mining, despite a photograph in the report of variously mutated brown trout.
docs.snippet: Selenium, a metal byproduct of mining that is known to be toxic to wildlife, is under review by federal agencies who are re-evaluating safe levels in creeks in southern Idaho.
